tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah Al-Insan, Ayah 1?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: At that time nobody in the whole world knew that the formation of a human being in the mother’s womb started with a drop or clot. When these two microscopic elements combined, that living thing started forming in the mother’s womb which finally took the shape of a human being
distractors: This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse narrates a historical event

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Al-Insan, Ayah 6?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: For one who adopts the way of ingratitude, there will be the punishment of Hell in the Hereafter, and for one who adopts the way of gratitude, there will be the bounties of Paradise
distractors: This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse describes the characteristics of believers

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: This is the description of a higher plane of Paradise where people of a higher level of faith will be settled. Royal bounties will fall to the lot of the inhabitants of this Paradise
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Either man has his worldly interests in view, and the fear of being deprived of these prevents him from going ahead towards the Truth. Both types of people create obstacles in the way of the mission of Truth
distractors: This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
